outputs.output_descr: This project provides support to the UN Country Team to maintream gender in all their development initiatives.  The availability of support will ensure that gender issues are taken into consideration when planning and implementing all projects.
outputs.output_title: Gender Support to UN Country T

project_descr: Addressing gender issues remains an integral aspect of development and a key focus of the UNDAF. This project is expected to contribute to an increased awareness of GBV issues and identify potential initiatives to be supported by the UN.
